caption: OSI Layer
description: The OSI Layer object describes characteristics and data associated with a specific layer of the OSI (Open Systems Interconnection) model. This object enables capturing protocol information, layer-specific data, and metadata from any of the seven OSI layers as observed in network traffic or system logs.
name: osi_layer

layer_name.caption: Layer Name
layer_name.description: The name of the OSI layer. For example: Physical, Data Link, Network, Transport, Session, Presentation, or Application.

layer_id.caption: Layer ID
layer_id.description: The normalized identifier of the OSI layer.
